Description:
Detects when an account was created and deleted in a short period of time.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', MikeDuddington, '@dudders1', Tim Shelton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Account Created And Deleted Within A Close Time Frame
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where (properties.message = 'add user' or properties.message = 'delete user') and status = 'success'
